For the CE53 sample, the Li-ion conductivity is about 1 order of magnitude higher than the values previously reported for LiBH 4–SiO 2-based composite SSEs: at 40 °C Blanchard et al. obtained 1.0 × 10 –5 S cm –1 for 28 v/v % of MCM-41,
20 Choi et al. obtained 1.5 × 10 –5 S cm –1 for 55 v/v % of fumed silica,
19 and Gulino et al. obtained 4.1 × 10 –5 S cm –1 for 20 v/v % of SiO 2.
